name: Little Mathematician solves problems using PEMDICE
name_original: Little Mathematician solves problems using PEMDICE
description:
Little Mathematician solves problems using PEMDICE is a puzzle game developed by GigglesandGlasses. It came out on 17-07-2022.
You can play Little Mathematician solves problems using PEMDICE on Web and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
